summary: Cash performs a concert for the inmates of California's Folsom Prison, and the show was recorded for a live album.
cast: Gene Beley|Jim Brown|June Carter Cash|John Carter Cash|Johnny Cash|Rosanne Cash|Millard Dedmon|Marshall Grant|Earl Green|Merle Haggard|W.S. Holland|John D. Loudermilk|Jim Marshall|Lou Robin|Bruce Sherley|Ronda Sherley|Marty Stuart|Jimmy Tittle
title: Johnny Cash at Folsom Prison
